translation: For he who truly sees the same Lord dwelling everywhere does not destroy the Self by the self; rather, he attains the highest goal.
commentary: 13.29 Samm eally? seeing seeing? Hi indeed? Everywhere everywhere? Equally dwelling eally? Ishwaram the Lord? Not not? kills destroys? Atmana by the self? Atmana the Self? Then then? Yati goes? Param the highest? Gatim the goal.Commentary This is the vision of a liberated sage. The Supreme Self abides in all forms. There is nothing apart from It.An ignorant man destroys the Self by identifying himself
